atk-abh03a2:3_1: Idāni pañcakkhandhādivasena nikkhittamātikaṁ ‘saṅgaho asaṅgaho’tiādīhi nayamātikāpadehi saddhiṁ yojetvā dassetuṁ rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehītiādinā nayena niddesavāro āraddho.
atk-abh03a2:3_2: Tattha yasmā ‘‘saṅgaho asaṅgahotiādikāya nayamātikāya ‘‘tīhi saṅgaho, tīhi asaṅgaho’’ti nayamukhamātikā ṭhapitā, tasmā rūpakkhandhādīnaṁ saṅgahaṁ dassetuṁ katihi khandhehi katihāyatanehi katihi dhātūhīti tīṇi khandhāyatanadhātupadāneva uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh03a2:3_4: Yasmā ca ‘‘sabhāgo visabhāgo’’ti evaṁ lakkhaṇamātikā ṭhapitā, tasmā imassa pañhassa vissajjane rūpakkhandho ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:3_7: Yañhi kiñci rūpaṁ rūpakkhandhasabhāgattā rūpakkhandhotveva saṅgahaṁ gacchatīti rūpakkhandheneva gaṇitaṁ, taṁ rūpakkhandheneva paricchinnaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:3_9: Sabbopi hi rūpakkhandho dasāyatanāni dhammāyatanekadeso ca hoti, tasmā ekādasahāyatanehi gaṇito , paricchinno.
atk-abh03a2:3_10: Ekādasahi dhātūhīti sattaviññāṇadhātuvajjāhi ekādasahi etāsu hi apariyāpannaṁ rūpaṁ nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:4_0: Asaṅgahanayaniddese katihi asaṅgahitoti saṅkhepeneva pucchā katā.
atk-abh03a2:4_1: Vissajjane panassa yasmā rūpakkhandhassa visabhāgā cattāro arūpakkhandhā, ekaṁ manāyatanaṁ, satta viññāṇadhātuyo;
atk-abh03a2:4_5: ‘‘rūpakkhandho katihi khandhehī’’tiādimhi tāva ekamūlake saṅgahanaye sarūpeneva dassitā pañca pucchā, pañca vissajjanāni.
atk-abh03a2:4_6: Asaṅgahanaye saṅkhepena dassitā pañca pucchā, pañca vissajjanāni.
atk-abh03a2:4_10: viññāṇakkhandho cā’’ti evaṁ bhedato ca, ‘‘pañcakkhandhā katihi khandhehī’’ti evaṁ abhedato cāti dvidhā pucchāvissajjanāni katāni.
atk-abh03a2:6_1: Āyatanapadaniddesādīsu āyatanapadaniddese tāva cakkhāyatanaṁ ekena khandhenāti ekena rūpakkhandheneva, ekena cakkhāyataneneva ekāya cakkhudhātuyāva saṅgahitanti veditabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:6_3: Asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvāti ettha pana yasmā asaṅkhataṁ dhammāyatanaṁ nāma nibbānaṁ, tañca khandhasaṅgahaṁ na gacchati;
atk-abh03a2:6_7: Viññāṇakkhandhena pana ṭhapetvā dhammāyatanadhammadhātuyo sesāyatanadhātūhi ca taṁ na saṅgayhati.
atk-abh03a2:6_10: Yathā ca te heṭṭhā rūpakkhandhamūlakā, evamidhāpi cakkhāyatanamūlakāva nayā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:6_11: Dukamattameva pana pāḷiyaṁ dassetvā ‘‘dvādasāyatanānī’’ti abhedatova pucchāvissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:7_3: Yasmā ca dukatikesu samudayasaccasadisameva maggasaccepi vissajjanaṁ, tasmā taṁ samudayānantaraṁ vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:8_2: jīvitindriyaṁ dvīhi khandhehīti rūpajīvitindriyaṁ rūpakkhandhena, arūpajīvitindriyaṁ saṅkhārakkhandhena saṅgahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:10_2: ‘‘avijjā katihi khandhehī’’ti pucchaṁ anārabhitvā avijjā ekena khandhenāti evaṁ vissajjanameva dassitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:10_3: Tattha saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇanti paṭisandhiyaṁ pavatte ca sabbampi vipākaviññāṇaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:10_7: Tenevettha saddāyatanampi saṅgahetvā ekādasahāyatanehi saṅgaho dassito.
atk-abh03a2:10_9: Aññeneva hi ekena khandhena phasso saṅgahito, aññena vedanā, taṇhāupādānakammabhavā pana saṅkhārakkhandheneva saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:10_11: Tattha kammabhavo phassādīhi sadisavisajjanattā tehi saddhiṁ ekato dassito.
atk-abh03a2:10_13: Yasmā cete upādinnakadhammāva tasmā ‘‘ekādasahāyatanehi sattarasahi dhātūhī’’ti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:10_14: Saddāyatanañhi anupādinnaṁ, taṁ ettha na gahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:11_8: Ekatalavāsikānañhi sesabrahmānaṁ cakkhusabbhāvato tassārammaṇattā tattha rūpāyatanaṁ uddhaṭaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:12_0: 71.Jāti dvīhi khandhehīti rūpajāti rūpakkhandhena, arūpajāti saṅkhārakkhandhena.
atk-abh03a2:12_2: Sokādīsupi ekena khandhenāti sokadukkhadomanassāni vedanākkhandhena, paridevo rūpakkhandhena, upāyāsādayo saṅkhārakkhandhenāti evaṁ khandhaviseso veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:13_3: Cittaṁ pana cetanānantaraṁ nikkhittampi asadisavissajjanattā pacchā gahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:13_4: Tattha appamaññādīsu ekena khandhenāti vedanā vedanākkhandhena, saññā saññākkhandhena, sesā saṅkhārakkhandhena saṅgahitāti evaṁ khandhaviseso veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:15_1: Evaṁ abbhantaramātikāya saṅgahaṁ dassetvā idāni bāhiramātikāya saṅgahaṁ dassetuṁ kusalā dhammātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:15_3: Sattahi dhātūhīti cakkhusotaghānajivhāviññāṇadhātūhi ceva manodhātudhammadhātumanoviññāṇadhātūhi ca.
atk-abh03a2:15_4: Vipākattike aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti kāyaviññāṇadhātuyā saddhiṁ tāhiyeva.
atk-abh03a2:15_5: Vipākadhammadhammā pana saṁkiliṭṭhasaṁkilesikehi saddhiṁ sadisavissajjanattā ekato gahitā.
atk-abh03a2:15_6: Yathā cete, evaṁ sabbatikadukapadesu yaṁ yaṁ padaṁ yena yena padena saddhiṁ sadisavissajjanaṁ hoti, taṁ taṁ uppaṭipāṭiyāpi tena tena saddhiṁ gahetvā vissajjitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:18_1: Idāni saṅgahitena asaṅgahitapadaṁ bhājetuṁ cakkhāyatanenātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:18_3: imasmiñhi vāre yaṁ khandhapadena saṅgahitaṁ hutvā āyatanadhātupadehi asaṅgahitaṁ, khandhāyatanapadehi vā saṅgahitaṁ hutvā dhātupadena asaṅgahitaṁ, tassa khandhādīhi asaṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:18_6: So ca aḍḍhekādasahi āyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahito nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:18_9: Evaṁ asaṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca evarūpāni manāyatanadhammāyatanādīni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:18_10: Yāni pana padāni rūpekadesaṁ arūpena asammissaṁ, viññāṇekadesañca aññena asammissaṁ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:23_2: Pañhavasena hi imasmiṁ vāre āyatanadhātuvaseneva sadisavissajjane vīsati dhamme samodhānetvā eko pañho kato, satta viññāṇadhātuyo samodhānetvā eko, sattindriyāni samodhānetvā eko, dve bhave samodhānetvā eko, paridevena ca sanidassanasappaṭighehi ca eko, anidassanasappaṭighehi eko, sanidassanehi eko, sappaṭighehi ca upādādhammehi ca ekoti aṭṭha pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a2:23_4: paṭhamapañhe tāva catūhi khandhehīti arūpakkhandhehi, dvīhāyatanehīti cakkhāyatanādīsu ekekena saddhiṁ manāyatanena, aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti cakkhudhātuādīsu ekekāya saddhiṁ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:24_2: Tasmiṁ saṅgahite rūpakkhandhe āyatanasaṅgahena cakkhāyatanamevekaṁ saṅgahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:24_6: Iti yāni tena asaṅgahitāni dasāyatanāni, tāni cakkhāyatanamanāyatanehi dvīhi asaṅgahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:24_7: Yāpi tena asaṅgahitā dasa dhātuyo, tā cakkhudhātuyā ceva sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhi asaṅgahitāti.
atk-abh03a2:25_2: yasmā yāya kāyaci viññāṇadhātuyā saṅgahito viññāṇakkhandho manāyatanena asaṅgahito nāma natthi, tasmā āyatanasaṅgahena saṅgahitāti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:25_3: Ettha pana catūhi khandhehīti rūpādīhi catūhi.
atk-abh03a2:25_5: Dvādasahi dhātūhīti yathānurūpā cha viññāṇadhātuyo apanetvā sesāhi dvādasahi.
atk-abh03a2:25_6: Cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyā hi cakkhuviññāṇadhātuyeva saṅgahitā, itarā asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:26_3: Itthindriyapurisindriyesu pana dhammāyatanena saddhiṁ dve āyatanāni, dhammadhātuyā ca saddhiṁ aṭṭha dhātuyo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:27_3: Tesu hi bhavesu rūpāyatanadhammāyatanavasena dveva āyatanāni tehi saṅgahitāni .
atk-abh03a2:27_4: Sesāni nava rūpāyatanāni teheva ca dvīhi, manāyatanena cāti tīhi asaṅgahitāni nāma honti.
atk-abh03a2:27_5: Navahi dhātūhīti rūpadhātudhammadhātūhi saddhiṁ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:28_4: Dhātuyopi tesaṁyeva ekekena saddhiṁ satta viññāṇadhātuyo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:29_4: Anidassanasappaṭighā hi dhammā nāma nava oḷārikāyatanāni.
atk-abh03a2:29_5: Tehi khandhasaṅgahena saṅgahite rūpakkhandhe, āyatanasaṅgahena tāneva navāyatanāni saṅgahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:29_7: Dhātusaṅgahenapi tā eva nava dhātuyo saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:29_9: Iti yāni tehi asaṅgahitāni dve āyatanāni , tāni rūpāyatanavajjehi navahi oḷārikāyatanehi, manāyatanena cāti dasahi asaṅgahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:29_10: Yāpi tehi asaṅgahitā dve dhātuyo, tā rūpadhātuvajjāhi navahi oḷārikadhātūhi, sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhīti soḷasahi asaṅgahitāti veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:30_3: Aṭṭhahi dhātūhīti rūpadhātuyā saddhiṁ sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:31_2: ekādasahāyatanehīti sappaṭighadhamme sandhāya dhammāyatanavajjehi, upādādhamme sandhāya phoṭṭhabbāyatanavajjehi.
atk-abh03a2:34_3: imasmiñhi vāre yaṁ khandhapadena asaṅgahitaṁ hutvā āyatanadhātupadehi saṅgahitaṁ, tassa khandhādīhi saṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:34_5: Rūpakkhandhena hi cattāro khandhā khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:34_6: Tesu tena ekadhammopi āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahito nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:34_9: Na pana rūpakkhandhova dhammāyatanaṁ, rūpakkhandhato hi sukhumarūpamattaṁ dhammāyatanaṁ bhajati.
atk-abh03a2:34_10: Tasmā ye dhammāyatanena saṅgahitā, na te rūpakkhandhena saṅgahitā nāma.
atk-abh03a2:34_12: Tesu tena ekopi āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahito nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:34_13: Evaṁ saṅgahitatāya abhāvato etāni aññāni ca evarūpāni cakkhāyatanādīni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:34_14: Yāni pana padāni viññāṇena vā oḷārikarūpena vā asammissaṁ dhammāyatanekadesaṁ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:35_0: ‘‘Tayo khandhā tathā saccā, indriyāni ca soḷasa;
atk-abh03a2:39_0: Etesu pana padesu sadisavissajjanāni padāni ekato katvā sabbepi dvādasa pañhā vuttā.
atk-abh03a2:40_1: vedanākkhandhena hi nibbānañca sukhumarūpasaññāsaṅkhārā ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:40_2: Tesu nibbānaṁ khandhasaṅgahaṁ na gacchati, sesā rūpasaññāsaṅkhārakkhandhehi saṅgahaṁ gacchanti.
atk-abh03a2:40_5: ‘‘asaṅkhataṁ khandhato ṭhapetvā tīhi khandhehi, ekenāyatanena, ekāya dhātuyā saṅgahitā’’ti.
atk-abh03a2:40_6: Saññākkhandhapakkhe panettha saññaṁ apanetvā vedanāya saddhiṁ tayo khandhā saṅkhārādīsu saṅkhārakkhandhaṁ apanetvā rūpavedanāsaññāvasena tayo khandhā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:41_2: Te hi nirodhena khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:42_2: Rūpārūpajīvitindriyena hi vedanāsaññāviññāṇakkhandhā ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:43_2: tīhi khandhehīti itthindriyapurisindriyesu vedanāsaññāsaṅkhārehi, vedanāpañcake rūpasaññāsaṅkhārehi;
atk-abh03a2:44_2: Jhānena pana nibbānaṁ sukhumarūpaṁ saññā ca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā hutvā āyatanadhātusaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:44_3: Tasmā taṁ sandhāya rūpakkhandhasaññākkhandhānaṁ vasena dve khandhā veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:45_3: Puna vedanāya vedanākkhandhasadiso, saññāya saññākkhandhasadiso, cetanādīsu saṅkhārakkhandhasadiso vinicchayo.
atk-abh03a2:48_2: Tattha yaṁ khandhādīhi saṅgahitena khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṁ, puna tasseva khandhādīhi saṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:48_3: Taṁ khandhāyatanadhātūsu ekampi sakalakoṭṭhāsaṁ gahetvā ṭhitapadesu na yujjati.
atk-abh03a2:48_4: Sakalena hi khandhādipadena aññaṁ khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṁ nāma natthi, yaṁ attano saṅgāhakaṁ saṅgaṇhitvā puna teneva saṅgahaṁ gaccheyya.
atk-abh03a2:48_5: Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:48_6: Yāni pana padāni saṅkhārekadesaṁ vā aññena asammissaṁ dīpenti –
atk-abh03a2:48_7: vedanekadesaṁ vā sukhumarūpaṁ vā saddekadesaṁ vā, tāni idha gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:51_1: Tattha yaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ padaṁ, tadeva yehi dhammehi khandhādivasena saṅgahitaṁ, te dhamme sandhāya sabbattha ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:51_3: samudayasaccena hi taṇhāvajjā sesā saṅkhārā khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:51_5: Sā taṇhā puna saṅkhāreheva khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitāti.
atk-abh03a2:51_7: Arūpadhammapucchāsu panettha saṅkhārakkhandho vā vedanākkhandho vā eko khandho nāma.
atk-abh03a2:51_10: Saddadhātu ekā dhātu nāma, sesaṭṭhānesu dhammāyatanadhammadhātuvaseneva attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a2:54_1: Idāni asaṅgahitena asaṅgahitapadaṁ bhājetuṁ rūpakkhandhenātiādi āraddhaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:54_2: Tattha yaṁ khandhādīhi asaṅgahitena khandhādivasena asaṅgahitaṁ, puna tasseva khandhādīhi asaṅgahaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:54_3: Taṁ pañcakkhandhaggāhakesu dukkhasaccādīsu viññāṇena saddhiṁ sukhumarūpaggāhakesu anidassanaappaṭighādīsu ca padesu na yujjati.
atk-abh03a2:54_4: Tādisena hi padena nibbānaṁ khandhasaṅgahamattaṁ na gaccheyya.
atk-abh03a2:54_6: Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:54_7: Yāni pana pañcakkhandhe viññāṇañca sukhumarūpena saddhiṁ ekato na dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:58_0: Gocchake sattati dve ca, satta cūḷantare padā.
atk-abh03a2:60_0: Aṭṭhāraseva ñātabbā, sesā idha na bhāsitā’’ti.
atk-abh03a2:61_0: Pañhā panettha sadisavissajjanānaṁ vasena samodhānetvā katihi saddhiṁ sabbepi catuttiṁsa honti.
atk-abh03a2:61_1: Tattha yaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ padaṁ, tadeva yehi khandhādīhi asaṅgahitaṁ, te dhamme sandhāya ekena khandhenātiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:62_1: rūpakkhandhena hi cattāro khandhā nibbānañca khandhasaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:62_2: Āyatanadhātusaṅgahena pana ṭhapetvā viññāṇaṁ avasesā saṅgahitāti viññāṇameva tīhipi khandhasaṅgahādīhi asaṅgahitaṁ nāma.
atk-abh03a2:62_3: Puna tena viññāṇena saddhiṁ nibbānena cattāro khandhā khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:62_4: Te sabbepi puna viññāṇeneva khandhādisaṅgahena asaṅgahitāti ekena khandhena, ekenāyatanena, sattahi dhātūhi asaṅgahitā nāma honti. Atha vā –
atk-abh03a2:62_5: yadetaṁ rūpakkhandhena viññāṇameva tīhi khandhādisaṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ, tehipi viññāṇadhammehi te rūpadhammāva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:62_6: Puna te rūpadhammā viññāṇeneva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:62_7: Viññāṇañca khandhato eko viññāṇakkhandho hoti, āyatanato ekaṁ manāyatanaṁ, dhātuto satta viññāṇadhātuyo.
atk-abh03a2:62_9: Iminā upāyena sabbattha yaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ padaṁ, tadeva yehi dhammehi khandhādivasena asaṅgahitaṁ, tesaṁ dhammānaṁ vasena khandhādayo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:62_13: Te ca dve khandhā ekādasāyatanāni sattarasa dhātuyo honti.
atk-abh03a2:63_0: 195. Tatiyapañhe – viññāṇaṁ rūpādīhi catūhi asaṅgahitanti tesaṁ vasena khandhādayo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:64_2: cakkhāyatanaṁ vedanādīhi catūhīti iminā nayena sabbattha khandhādayo veditabbā.
atk-abh03a2:64_4: rūpañca dhammāyatananti uddānagāthāya dassitadhammāyeva aññenākārena saṅkhipitvā dassitāti.
atk-abh03a2:67_2: Tattha yaṁ labbhati yañca na labbhati taṁ sabbaṁ pucchāya gahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:67_3: Vissajjane pana yaṁ na labbhati, taṁ natthīti paṭikkhittaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:67_5: sabhāgo visabhāgoti hi vacanato catūhi arūpakkhandheheva sabhāgānaṁ ekasantānasmiṁ ekakkhaṇe uppannānaṁ arūpakkhandhānaṁyeva aññamaññaṁ sampayogo labbhati.
atk-abh03a2:67_6: Rūpadhammānaṁ pana rūpena nibbānena vā, nibbānassa ca rūpena saddhiṁ sampayogo nāma natthi.
atk-abh03a2:67_7: Tathā rūpanibbānānaṁ arūpakkhandhehi, visabhāgā hi te tesaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:67_8: Yathā ca arūpakkhandhānaṁ rūpanibbānehi, evaṁ bhinnasantānehi nānākkhaṇikehi arūpadhammehipi saddhiṁ natthiyeva.
atk-abh03a2:67_10: Ayaṁ pana visabhāgatā saṅgahaṭṭhena virujjhanato saṅgahanaye natthi.
atk-abh03a2:67_13: Evamettha yassa ekadhammenapi sampayogalakkhaṇaṁ na yujjhati, tassa pucchāya saṅgahaṁ katvāpi natthīti paṭikkhepo kato.
atk-abh03a2:67_14: Yassa vippayogalakkhaṇaṁ yujjati, tassa vippayogo dassito.
atk-abh03a2:67_15: Yāni pana padāni sattasu viññāṇadhātūsu ekāyapi avippayutte rūpena nibbānena vā missakadhamme dīpenti, tāni sabbathāpi idha na yujjantīti na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:71_0: Gocchakesu ca paññāsa, aṭṭha cūḷantare padā.
atk-abh03a2:73_0: Tevīsa padasataṁ etaṁ, sampayoge na labbhatī’’ti.
atk-abh03a2:74_0: Dhammāyatanañhi rūpanibbānamissakattā tasmiṁ apariyāpannena viññāṇenapi na sakkā sampayuttanti vattuṁ.
atk-abh03a2:74_1: Yasmā panettha vedanādayo viññāṇena sampayuttā, tasmā vippayuttantipi na sakkā vattuṁ.
atk-abh03a2:74_3: Evaṁ sabbatthāpi etāni na yujjantīti idha na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:74_4: Sesāni khandhādīni yujjantīti tāni gahetvā ekekavasena ca samodhānena ca pañhavissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:75_5: Evaṁ sabbattha rūpassa vippayoge dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu arūpaṁ, arūpassa vippayoge rūpaṁ daṭṭhabbaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:76_5: Ādipañhasmiñhi sarūpato dassetvā parato pāḷi saṁkhittā.
atk-abh03a2:76_7: Yattha pana nātipākaṭā bhavissati, tattha naṁ pākaṭaṁ katvāva gamissāma.
atk-abh03a2:77_0: 234.Soḷasahi dhātūhīti cakkhuviññāṇadhātu tāva attānaṁ ṭhapetvā chahi viññāṇadhātūhi, dasahi ca rūpadhātūhi.
atk-abh03a2:78_6: Etesu hi taṁ saccadvayaṁ kehici sampayuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:80_2: sabbesampi arūpakkhandhānaṁ arūpāyatanānañca atthitāya na kehicīti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:80_3: Ghānajivhākāyaviññāṇadhātūnaṁ pana natthitāya tīhi dhātūhi vippayuttoti vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:81_3: Pannarasahīti sesāhi dasahi rūpadhātūhi, pañcahi ca cakkhuviññāṇādīhi.
atk-abh03a2:82_0: 257. Kusalapañhe – kusalehi catunnampi khandhānaṁ gahitattā sampayogo paṭikkhitto.
atk-abh03a2:84_11: Tattha vicāro vicārena, pīti ca pītiyā na sampayuttāti saṅkhārakkhandhadhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu kehici sampayuttā nāma.
atk-abh03a2:85_2: Kehicīti ye tattha parittārammaṇā na honti, tehi.
atk-abh03a2:85_3: Dhammadhātu pana parittārammaṇānaṁ channaṁ cittuppādānaṁ vasena catūhi khandhehi saṅgahitattā paṭhamapaṭikkhepameva bhajati.
atk-abh03a2:86_3: Tāni hi ekantena uppādidhammabhūtāneva, uppannakoṭṭhāsampi pana bhajanti.
atk-abh03a2:86_6: Sahetukā ceva na ca hetūpi pītisahagatasadisāva.
atk-abh03a2:89_3: imasmiñhi vāre pucchāya uddhaṭapadena ye dhammā sampayuttā, tehi ye dhammā vippayuttā, tesaṁ khandhādīhi vippayogaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:89_6: Tasmā tañca aññāni ca evarūpāni padāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:89_7: Yāni pana padāni dhammadhātuyā sampayutte dhamme viññāṇañca aññena asammissaṁ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:96_2: Tattha yāni padāni sadisavissajjanāni, tāni uppaṭipāṭiyāpi samodhānetvā tattha vedanākkhandhādikā pañhā katā.
atk-abh03a2:96_9: te dhammā na kehicīti te pucchāya uddhaṭapadaṁ viññāṇadhātuṁ ṭhapetvā sesā cha viññāṇadhātudhammā, rūpaṁ, nibbānañca.
atk-abh03a2:96_10: Tehi sabbesaṁ khandhāyatanānaṁ saṅgahitattā na kehici khandhehi āyatanehi vā vippayuttā.
atk-abh03a2:96_11: Ekāya dhātuyāti yā yā pucchāya uddhaṭā hoti tāya tāya.
atk-abh03a2:97_3: Iminā nayena sabbattha pucchāya uddhaṭapadeneva saddhiṁ vippayuttānaṁ vasena attho veditabboti.
atk-abh03a2:100_3: Rūpakkhandhena hi vippayuttā nāma cattāro khandhā, tesaṁ aññehi sampayogo natthi.
atk-abh03a2:100_4: Vedanākkhandhena vippayuttaṁ rūpaṁ nibbānañca, tassa ca kenaci sampayogo natthi.
atk-abh03a2:100_7: Iti pucchāya moghattā sabbavissajjanesu natthi natthiicceva vuttanti.
atk-abh03a2:103_2: Tattha yaṁ khandhādivasena sampayuttaṁ, puna tasseva khandhādīhi sampayogaṁ pucchitvā vissajjanaṁ kataṁ.
atk-abh03a2:103_3: Taṁ rūpena vā rūpamissakehi vā sabbarūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehi vā padehi saddhiṁ na yujjati.
atk-abh03a2:103_4: Rūpena hi rūpamissakena vā aññesaṁ sampayogo natthi.
atk-abh03a2:103_5: Sabbarūpakkhandhasaṅgāhakehi sabbesaṁ sampayogārahānaṁ khandhādīnaṁ gahitattā aññaṁyeva natthi, yaṁ tena saha sampayogaṁ gaccheyya.
atk-abh03a2:103_6: Tasmā tathārūpāni padāni idha na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:103_7: Yāni pana padāni rūpena asammissaṁ arūpekadesaṁ dīpenti, tāni idha gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:110_0: Sabbapañhesu pana ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭā, te yehi sampayuttā honti, tesaṁ vasena khandhādibhedo veditabbo .
atk-abh03a2:110_1: Vedanākkhandhena hi itare tayo khandhā sampayuttā, puna tehi vedanākkhandho sampayutto.
atk-abh03a2:110_2: So tehi saññādīhi tīhi khandhehi, ekena manāyatanena, sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi, ekasmiṁ dhammāyatane, dhammadhātuyā ca, kehici saññāsaṅkhāreheva sampayutto.
atk-abh03a2:113_2: Tattha ye sampayogavippayogapadaniddese rūpakkhandhādayo dhammā uddhaṭā, sabbapucchāsu teyeva uddhaṭā.
atk-abh03a2:113_3: Sadisavissajjanānaṁ pana ekato gahitattā padāni aññāya paṭipāṭiyā āgatāni.
atk-abh03a2:113_4: Tattha yaṁ padaṁ pucchāya uddhaṭaṁ, taṁ yehi dhammehi vippayuttaṁ, tesaṁ vasena khandhādivibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:113_5: Rūpakkhandhena hi vedanādayo vippayuttā, tehi ca rūpakkhandho vippayutto.
atk-abh03a2:113_7: So rūpakkhandho catūhi khandhehi, ekena manāyatanena sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi, dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu, kehici vedanādīhi dhammeheva vippayutto.
atk-abh03a2:116_2: Tattha ye saṅgahitenasaṅgahitapadaniddese samudayasaccādayova dhammā uddhaṭā, sabbapucchāsu teyeva uddhaṭā.
atk-abh03a2:116_3: Sadisavissajjanānaṁ pana ekato gahitattā padāni aññāya paṭipāṭiyā āgatāni.
atk-abh03a2:116_4: Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭapadena khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā, tesaṁ yehi sampayogo vā vippayogo vā hoti, tesaṁ vasena khandhādivibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:117_1: samudayasaccena tāva saṅkhārakkhandhapariyāpannā dhammā khandhādisaṅgahena saṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:117_2: Te ca sesehi tīhi khandhehi, ekena manāyatanena, sattahi viññāṇadhātūhi, saṅkhārakkhandhe dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca ṭhapetvā taṇhaṁ sesehi sampayuttattā kehici sampayuttā nāma.
atk-abh03a2:117_3: Ekena pana rūpakkhandhena, dasahi rūpāyatanehi, rūpadhātūhi ca vippayuttā, ekasmiṁ dhammāyatane dhammadhātuyā ca, rūpanibbānehi vippayuttattā kehici vippayuttā nāma.
atk-abh03a2:120_2: Tattha ye sampayuttenasampayuttapadaniddese vedanākkhandhādayo dhammā uddhaṭā, sabbapucchāsu teyeva uddhaṭā.
atk-abh03a2:120_3: Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭapadena sampayuttā, tesaṁ yehi saṅgaho vā asaṅgaho vā hoti, tesaṁ vasena khandhādibhedo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:121_2: Te saññādayo tīhi saññādikkhandhehi, dvīhi dhammāyatanamanāyatanehi, dhammadhātuyā ceva, sattahi ca viññāṇadhātūhīti aṭṭhahi dhātūhi saṅgahitā, sesāhi khandhāyatanadhātūhi asaṅgahitā.
atk-abh03a2:124_2: Tattha ye pañcame asaṅgahitenaasaṅgahitapadaniddese rūpakkhandhena sadisapañhā dhammā, ye ca arūpabhavena sadisā, teyeva uddhaṭā.
atk-abh03a2:124_3: Sesā pana na ruhantīti na uddhaṭā.
atk-abh03a2:124_4: Vedanākkhandhena hi khandhādivasena pana rūpārūpadhammā asaṅgahitā honti.
atk-abh03a2:124_6: Tasmā yāni padāni ruhanti, tāneva sadisavissajjanehi saddhiṁ samodhānetvā uddhaṭāni.
atk-abh03a2:124_7: Tattha ye dhammā pucchāya uddhaṭadhammehi khandhādivasena asaṅgahitā, te yehi sampayuttā ca vippayuttā ca, tesaṁ vasena khandhādivibhāgo veditabbo.
atk-abh03a2:125_1: rūpakkhandhena tāva viññāṇameva tīhi saṅgahehi asaṅgahitaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:125_2: Taṁ vedanādīhi tīhi khandhehi, dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca vedanādīheva sampayuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:125_3: Ekena rūpakkhandhena, dasahi rūpāyatanarūpadhātūhi, dhammāyatanadhammadhātūsu ca rūpanibbānadhammehi vippayuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:125_4: Taṁ sandhāya te dhammā tīhi khandhehītiādi vuttaṁ.
atk-abh03a2:128_2: Tattha yesaṁ padānaṁ vippayogo na ruhati, tāni imasmiṁ vāre na gahitāni.
atk-abh03a2:128_5: Dhammāyatanassa hi khandhādīsu ekenāpi vippayogo na ruhati.
atk-abh03a2:134_0: Cha padāni tato uddhaṁ sabbānipi samāsato;
atk-abh03a2:135_0: Padāni ca na labbhanti, cattālīsañca satta cā’’ti.
atk-abh03a2:136_1: dhammāyatanaṁ dhammadhātūti gāthāpi imamevatthaṁ dīpetuṁ vuttā.
atk-abh03a2:136_2: Imāni pana ṭhapetvā sesāni sabbānipi labbhanti.
atk-abh03a2:143_0: Ñātuṁ sabbepi nayā, saṅkhepakathāva iti vuttā.
atk-abh03a2:144_0: Ekekassa pana sace, padassa vitthārameva bhāseyyaṁ;
atk-abh03a2:145_0: Vacanañca ativiya bahuṁ, bhaveyya attho ca aviseso.
atk-abh03a2:146_0: Iti ūnabhāṇavāradvayāya, yaṁ tantiyā mayā etaṁ;
atk-abh03a2:147_0: Kurunā pattaṁ puññaṁ, sukhāya taṁ hotu lokassāti.
